00046 HashTable::get(unsigned pos)

00051 /* Create hash table, initialise ptrs to NULL */
00052 void
00053 HashTable::inithashtable(bool countOrder)
00054 {
00055     int     i;
00056     TSIZE = INITIAL_SIZE;
00057     numNodes = 0;
00058     countOriginalOrder= countOrder;
00059     hash = (HASHREC **) malloc( sizeof(HASHREC *) * TSIZE );
00060 
00061     for( i=0 ; i<TSIZE ; i++ )
00062     hash[i] = (HASHREC *) NULL;
00063 }
00064 
00065 /* Create hash table with a given size, initialise ptrs to NULL */
00066 void
00067 HashTable::inithashtable(unsigned int size,bool countOrder)
00068 {
00069     int     i;
00070     TSIZE = size;
00071     numNodes = 0;
00072     countOriginalOrder= countOrder;
00073     hash = (HASHREC **) malloc( sizeof(HASHREC *) * TSIZE );
00074 
00075     for( i=0 ; i<TSIZE ; i++ )
00076     hash[i] = (HASHREC *) NULL;
00077 }
00078 
00079 void
00080 HashTable::delete_key(char *w)
00081 {   
00082     HASHREC *htmp, *hprv;
00083     unsigned int hval = HASHFN(w, TSIZE, SEED); 
00084 
00085     for( hprv = NULL, htmp=hash[hval]
00086         ; htmp != NULL && scmp(htmp, w) != 0
00087         ; hprv = htmp, htmp = htmp->next )
00088     {
00089     ;
00090     }
00091     
00092     if(hprv == NULL)hash[hval] = htmp->next;
00093     else hprv->next = htmp->next;
00094     
00095     free(htmp->word);
00096     numNodes--;
00097 //    free(htmp);
00098     htmp = NULL;
00099 }

00102 /* Search hash table for given string, return record if found, else NULL */
00103 HASHREC *
00104 HashTable::hashsearch(char *w)
00105 {   
00106     HASHREC *htmp, *hprv;
00107     unsigned int hval = HASHFN(w, TSIZE, SEED);
00108     
00109     for( hprv = NULL, htmp=hash[hval]
00110         ; htmp != NULL && scmp(htmp, w) != 0
00111         ; hprv = htmp, htmp = htmp->next )
00112     {
00113     ;
00114     }
00115 
00116     if( hprv!=NULL && htmp!=NULL ) /* move to front on access */
00117     {
00118     hprv->next = htmp->next;
00119     htmp->next = hash[hval];
00120     hash[hval] = htmp;
00121     }
00122 
00123     return(htmp);
00124 }
00125 
00126 /* Search hash table for given rec to get another equivalent, return record if found, else NULL */
00127 HASHREC *
00128 HashTable::hashsearch(HASHREC *rec)
00129 {   
00130     HASHREC *htmp, *hprv;
00131     
00132      char *w;
00133     
00134     if (rec->prefix==NULL){
00135         w= rec->word;
00136     }
00137     else{ //concat prefix and suffix in w
00138         w = (char *)malloc (strlen(rec->prefix->word)+strlen(rec->word)+1);
00139         strcpy(w,rec->prefix->word);
00140         strcat(w,rec->word);
00141     }
00142     
00143     unsigned int hval = HASHFN(w, TSIZE, SEED);
00144     
00145     for( hprv = NULL, htmp=hash[hval]
00146         ; htmp != NULL && scmp(htmp, w) != 0
00147         ; hprv = htmp, htmp = htmp->next )
00148     {
00149     ;
00150     }
00151 
00152     if( hprv!=NULL && htmp!=NULL ) /* move to front on access */
00153     {
00154     hprv->next = htmp->next;
00155     htmp->next = hash[hval];
00156     hash[hval] = htmp;
00157     }
00158     
00159     if (rec->prefix!=NULL){
00160         free(w);
00161     }
00162     
00163 
00164     return(htmp);
00165 }

00167 /* Search hash table for given string, insert if not found 
00168  * update information if found
00169  */
00170 
00171 HASHREC*
00172 HashTable::hashinsert(HASHREC* shared, unsigned int &globalId)
00173 {
00174     HASHREC *htmp, *hprv;
00175     char *w;
00176     
00177     if (shared->prefix==NULL){
00178         w= shared->word;
00179     }
00180     else{ //concat prefix and suffix in w
00181         w = (char *)malloc (strlen(shared->prefix->word)+strlen(shared->word)+1);
00182         strcpy(w,shared->prefix->word);
00183         strcat(w,shared->word);
00184     }
00185     unsigned int hval = HASHFN(w, TSIZE, SEED);
00186 
00187     for( hprv = NULL, htmp=hash[hval]
00188         ; htmp != NULL && scmp(htmp, w) != 0
00189         ; hprv = htmp, htmp = htmp->next )
00190     {
00191     ;
00192     }
00193 
00194     if( htmp==NULL )
00195     {   
00196    
00197         htmp = (HASHREC *) malloc( sizeof(HASHREC) );
00198         
00199         htmp->shared=true;
00200         
00201         if (shared->prefix==NULL){
00202             htmp->word=w; //get the same reference
00203             htmp->prefix=NULL;
00204         }
00205         else{
00206             htmp->word = shared->word;
00207             htmp->prefix = shared->prefix;
00208         }
00209         
00210         if (countOriginalOrder==false)                  
00211             htmp->id = 0; //initialize to 0, asigned after the final sort
00212         else{
00213             htmp->id = globalId;
00214             globalId++;
00215         }
00216         htmp->new_id=0;
00217         htmp->count=1;
00218         numNodes++;
00219         htmp->next = NULL;
00220             
00221         if( hprv==NULL )
00222             hash[hval] = htmp;
00223         else
00224             hprv->next = htmp;
00225     
00226         /* new records are not moved to front */
00227     }
00228     else
00229     {
00230         htmp->count=htmp->count+1;
00231         htmp->shared = true;
00232         if( hprv!=NULL ) /* move to front on access */
00233         {
00234             hprv->next = htmp->next;
00235             htmp->next = hash[hval];
00236             hash[hval] = htmp;
00237         }
00238         
00239     }
00240     
00241     if (shared->prefix!=NULL)
00242         free(w);
00243    
00244     return htmp;
00245 }

00247 /* Search hash table for given string, insert if not found 
00248  * update information if found
00249  * 
00250  * Insert not shared, prefix or not
00251  */
00252 
00253 HASHREC*
00254 HashTable::hashinsert(char *w, unsigned int &globalId,MINIHASHREC* prefix)
00255 {
00256     HASHREC *htmp, *hprv;
00257     unsigned int hval = HASHFN(w, TSIZE, SEED);
00258     
00259     
00260     for( hprv = NULL, htmp=hash[hval]
00261         ; htmp != NULL && scmp(htmp, w) != 0
00262         ; hprv = htmp, htmp = htmp->next )
00263     {
00264     ;
00265     }
00266    
00267     if( htmp==NULL )
00268     {
00269     
00270         
00271         htmp = (HASHREC *) malloc( sizeof(HASHREC) );
00272         
00273         htmp->shared=false;
00274         
00275         if (prefix!=NULL){
00276             htmp->prefix = prefix;
00277             htmp->word = (char *) malloc( strlen(w) - strlen(prefix->word) + 1 );
00278             strcpy(htmp->word, w+strlen(prefix->word)); //copy the suffix value
00279             
00280         }
00281         else{
00282             htmp->prefix=NULL;
00283             htmp->word = (char *) malloc( strlen(w) + 1 );
00284             strcpy(htmp->word, w); //copy the value
00285         }
00286         
00287         if (countOriginalOrder==false)                  
00288             htmp->id = 0; //initialize to 0, asigned after the final sort
00289         else{
00290             htmp->id = globalId;
00291             globalId++;
00292         }
00293         htmp->new_id=0;
00294         htmp->count=1;
00295         numNodes++;
00296         htmp->next = NULL;
00297             
00298         if( hprv==NULL )
00299             hash[hval] = htmp;
00300         else
00301             hprv->next = htmp;
00302     
00303         /* new records are not moved to front */
00304     }
00305     else
00306     {
00307         
00308         htmp->count=htmp->count+1;
00309         htmp->shared = false;
00310         if( hprv!=NULL ) /* move to front on access */
00311         {
00312             hprv->next = htmp->next;
00313             htmp->next = hash[hval];
00314             hash[hval] = htmp;
00315         }
00316         
00317     }
00318    
00319     return htmp;
00320 }

00324 HashTable::dump()
00325 {
00326   int i;
00327   HASHREC *ptr;
00328 
00329   for( i=0; i<TSIZE; i++ )
00330   {
00331       for( ptr=hash[i]; ptr!=NULL; ptr=ptr->next )
00332       {
00333           // ptr stores current element in the iteration 
00334 
00335       }
00336   }
00337 }
00338 
00339 /* Bitwise hash function.  Note that tsize does not have to be prime. */
00340 unsigned int
00341 HashTable::bitwisehash(char *word, unsigned int tsize, unsigned int seed)
00342 {
00343     char    c;
00344     unsigned int h;
00345 
00346     h = seed;
00347     for( ; ( c=*word )!='\0' ; word++ )
00348     {
00349     h ^= ( (h << 5) + c + (h >> 2) );
00350     }
00351     return((unsigned int)((h&0x7fffffff) % tsize));
00352 }
00353 
00354 int
00355 HashTable::scmp( HASHREC* htmp, char *s2 )
00356 {
00357     char* it;
00358     
00359     if (htmp->prefix==NULL){
00360         
00361         it = htmp->word;
00362         
00363         while( *it != '\0' && *it == *s2 )
00364         {
00365         it++;
00366         s2++;
00367         }
00368         return( *it-*s2 );
00369     }   
00370     
00371     else{
00372         it = htmp->prefix->word;
00373         
00374         // compare with prefix and suffix. 
00375         while(  it!= '\0' && *it== *s2)
00376         {
00377             it++;
00378             s2++;
00379         }
00380         if (*it != '\0'){
00381             //not match
00382             return( *it-*s2 );
00383         }
00384         else{
00385             //match prefix, test suffix (from the last pointer of s2)
00386             
00387             
00388             it = htmp->word;
00389             while( *it != '\0' && *it == *s2 )
00390             {
00391             it++;
00392             s2++;
00393             }
00394             
00395             return( *it-*s2 );
00396             
00397         }
00398     }
00399 }
00400 
00401 HashTable::~HashTable()
00402 {   
00403       for(int i=0 ; i<TSIZE ; i++ )
00404       {
00405           HASHREC* ptr;
00406           while (hash[i] != NULL)
00407           {
00408               ptr = hash[i]->next;
00409               // MIRARLO EN ALGÃšN MOMENTO!!!
00410           //    if (hash[i]->word != NULL)
00411           //        free(hash[i]->word);
00412 
00413               free(hash[i]);
00414               hash[i] = ptr;   
00415           }
00416       }
00417 
00418       free(hash);
00419 }
00420 unsigned int
00421 HashTable::size()
00422 {
00423 return numNodes;                 
00424 }
